title: Sexy celebs in their 70s
text:
Sexy celebs in their 70s Updated 1945 GMT (0345 HKT) March 10, 2015 
Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. Photos: Sexy celebs in their 70s Happy birthday, Chuck Norris! The actor and martial-arts star celebrates his 75th birthday on Tuesday, March 10. He's part of an elite club of other sexy septuagenarians: Hide Caption Photos: Sexy celebs in their 70s Actor Michael Douglas celebrated his 70th milestone on September 25, 2014. Hide Caption 2 of 20 Photos: Sexy celebs in their 70s Paul McCartney, one of the last surviving members of The Beatles, turned 72 on June 18, 2014. Hide Caption Photos: Sexy celebs in their 70s This songbird has aged beautifully. Gladys Knight turned 70 on May 28, 2014. Hide Caption 4 of 20 Photos: Sexy celebs in their 70s Chanteuse Patti LaBelle has been in the music industry for decades, but she hasn't slowed down. She turned 70 on May 24, 2014. Hide Caption Photos: Sexy celebs in their 70s Actress Faye Dunaway, here receiving an award in 2013, is 74. Hide Caption 6 of 20 Photos: Sexy celebs in their 70s We are sure that in all of her years, Martha Stewart has enjoyed some tasty cuisine. The domestic doyenne is 73. Hide Caption Photos: Sexy celebs in their 70s Ay caramba! Raquel Welch ( born Jo Raquel Tejada ) hardly looks 74 years old. Hide Caption 8 of 20 Photos: Sexy celebs in their 70s At 75, British actor Ian McKellan has stayed active, both on stage with his pal Patrick Stewart and on screen. Hide Caption 9 of 20 Photos: Sexy celebs in their 70s Years of aerobics have clearly done Jane Fonda's body well. The actress/activist is 77 years old. Hide Caption 10 of 20 Photos: Sexy celebs in their 70s What's age got to do with it? At 75 years old, singer Tina Turner still has all the right moves and those incredible legs. Hide Caption Photos: Sexy celebs in their 70s Actress Diahann Carroll remains stunning at 79. Hide Caption Photos: Sexy celebs in their 70s It's hard to believe that Michael Corleone is in his 70s. Al Pacino is 74. Hide Caption Photos: Sexy celebs in their 70s We are guessing that many folks don't know that TV personality Joy Behar is 72. Hide Caption 14 of 20 Photos: Sexy celebs in their 70s It's clear where Gwyneth Paltrow gets her genes. Her mother, actress Blythe Danner, looks great at 72. Hide Caption Photos: Sexy celebs in their 70s At 72, Barbra Streisand still has the pipes to wow fans at concerts. Hide Caption 16 of 20 Photos: Sexy celebs in their 70s We can still see why Elvis was so taken with Ann-Margret. The actress remains stunning at 73. Hide Caption 17 of 20 Photos: Sexy celebs in their 70s O captain, our captain! Sir Patrick Stewart made hearts throb as the suave Capt. Jean-Luc Picard on "Star Trek: The Next Generation" and a few of the "Star Trek" movies. He's still looking fine at 74. Hide Caption Photos: Sexy celebs in their 70s Robert De Niro, 71, has spent decades in the movie industry to much acclaim. Hide Caption 19 of 20 Photos: Sexy celebs in their 70s He may be 72, but we are guessing that actor Harrison Ford stays spry raising teen son Liam with his wife, actress Calista Flockhart.
